title: Citi Named Best FX Bank in 11 Countries in Latin America in Euromoney's FX Survey 2013
summary: Miami - Citi has been recognized as the number one FX bank in 11 countries across Latin America in the prestigious Euromoney FX Survey 2013. The firm has the largest FX market share in Argentina, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Guatemala, Haiti, Honduras, Mexico, Trinidad & Tobago, Uruguay and Venezuela . tag-4: Commenting on the poll, Jaime Roblesgil, Head of Citi Markets for Latin America, said: "We are honored to be recognized in this prestigious survey, and to receive this important distinction from our clients. We are committed to continue offering high quality financial services and solutions to create the best outcomes for our clients."
tag-5: Euromoney's FX Survey, which has been published annually since 1979, is the global benchmark for performance in the foreign exchange industry. This year, the survey achieved a record level of participation with more than 16,000 valid votes and more than $200 trillion in volume.
